Uses of MapReduceBuilder in com.basho.riak.client
 

Methods in com.basho.riak.client that return MapReduceBuilder
 MapReduceBuilder RiakClient.mapReduceOverBucket(java.lang.String bucket)
          A convenience method for creating a MapReduceBuilder used for building a map reduce job to submission to this client
 MapReduceBuilder RiakClient.mapReduceOverObjects(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> objects)
          Same as RiakClient.mapReduceOverBucket(String), except over a set of objects instead of a bucket.

          Adds a link phase to the job

          Adds a map phase to the job
 MapReduceBuilder MapReduceBuilder.reduce(MapReduceFunction function, boolean keep)

          Sets the name of the Riak bucket the map/reduce job will process
